page.title: 11EDUCATION.
page.content: Fladbury Church of England Aided School was built in 1865.The original Victorian school building is now used as a school hall.The school house, which was until recently occupied by the Headteacher, is now privately rented.Fladbury School was designated a First School in September 1976 when three tier re-organisation took place in the Pershore Education District.The age range covered is five to nine years,at which time the children transfer to Pinvin Middle School.There are approximately 100 children on role organised into four classes. transfer to Pinvin Middle School.
